mapper.sql: id, business_module,business_type,request_method, method, ip, remarks, create_by, create_time, delete_flag, error_msg,status
mapper.insert: insert into sys_log(business_module, business_type, method, request_method, ip,status, error_msg, remarks, create_by, create_time) values (#{businessModule}, #{businessType}, #{method}, #{requestMethod}, #{ip}, #{status}, #{errorMsg}, #{remarks}, #{createBy}, sysdate())

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sys_log
business_type,
business_module,
method,
ip,
remarks,
create_by,
create_time,
delete_flag,
#{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{businessModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update sys_log
business_type = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_module = #{businessModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_log set business_type = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_module = #{businessModule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
